Michael Stoj

3807 40th Street Apt 2· Kenosha, WI 53144 · (262) 455-3351 · mstoj2020@gmail.com

As a highly skilled computer programmer, I bring a wealth of technical expertise and problem-solving abilities to any development team. With six years of experience in software engineering, I have a deep understanding of programming languages such as Java, Python, JavaScript, as well as proficiency in software design, testing, and debugging.

I am a proactive and collaborative team player who enjoys working on complex projects that require innovation and attention to detail. I thrive in fast-paced environments and am always looking for ways to optimize and improve my work. In addition, I have a strong ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, which enables me to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

In my previous roles, I have demonstrated my ability to deliver high-quality code on time and on budget, while ensuring that the end product meets both technical requirements and user needs. Some of my notable achievements include building a Pega Bot for CNO which is a NYSE listed compnay.

I am passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems, and am always looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills in the field. As a dedicated lifelong learner, I am constantly exploring new technologies and staying up-to-date on the latest trends in software development.

Overall, I am excited about the prospect of joining a dynamic team of developers where I can use my skills and experience to make a meaningful contribution to the company's success.
